personalInfo.name: Your Name
personalInfo.headline: Crafting digital experiences that feel alive
personalInfo.subtitle: I design and build interfaces that blend elegant aesthetics with thoughtful interaction, creating moments of delight in every detail.
aboutText: I'm a passionate developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional digital experiences. With a background in both design and development, I bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or experimenting with creative coding and generative art.

projects.title: Immersive Gallery
projects.description: A 3D art gallery with spatial audio and gesture controls

projects.title: Neural Interface
projects.description: Real-time data visualization for AI model training

projects.title: Sonic Landscapes

projects.title: Fluid Commerce
